channel.title: I need help!

item.title: I need help!
item.dc:creator: @devildude797 devildude797
item.description:
@devildude797 wrote:

help me plz!!! i need NPC 2258 (zammy mage) to trade with me. i have added this into NPCHandler : } if (npcs[i].npcType == 2258) { // mage of zammy - abyss if (misc.random2(30) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Iv'e got pure ess for you RC'ers."; }

But how do i get it so that i can add items into shops.cfg?

Read full topic
